summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 27 November to end of Monday 29 November GMT
description: Feeling cold throughout the weekend as air arriving on strong winds from the Arctic Circle affects Greater London. As a result, locally-emitted pollutants will be quickly dispersed.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
